name: Braunschweiger Dom

description: Colorful pop art building designed by James Rizzi, featuring whimsical faces and patterns

description: Historic park with beautiful landscaping and walking paths

name: Herzog Anton Ulrich Museum
description: Oldest art museum in Germany with impressive collections
